Name: Monster Shooter
About the game: Merry and great hunter Jerry took up arms again and is ready to destroy the hordes of hidden monsters. They are literally everywhere, behind every bush or tree. Will you be able to show who is the most accurate shooter in this area and whether Jerry has lost his grip? Monster Shooter - an arcade shooter game. Player controls the scope and shoots at monsters jumping out of hiding. All your actions are counted in the bonus score. To go to the next level and test your skills in a new location, you need to gain a certain score. Main features: Challenging gameplay It's training your reaction! Beautiful Pixel-Art
